issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add isErasureCoded() API to FileStatus class

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: HDFS-6843 and HADOOP-13715 have enhanced {{FileStatus}} to include details on whether the underlying path is Encrypted and Erasure Coded. The additional details are embedded in the FsPermission high order bits. It would be really helpful for debugging if FileStatus#toString() returns these new bits details along with already existing one.
fields.summary: Extend FileStatus#toString() to include details like Erasure Coding and Encryption

comments.body:
Attached v01 patch to extend FileStatus as following.
* added hasAcl() to return the ACL bit set in FsPermission, and on the same lines of isEncrypted() and isErasureCoded()
* extended toString() to return set or unset details on ACL, encryption and erasure coding.
* FileSystem spec updated
* Unit tests to verify the newly added details in FileStatus
[~andrew.wang], [~stevel@apache.org] can you please take a look at the patch ?

1. Test failure in [TestGetFileStatus.java#L68-L68|https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/4966a6e26e45d7dc36e0b270066ff7c87bcd00cc/hadoop-tools/hadoop-azure-datalake/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/adl/TestGetFileStatus.java#L68-L68] is caused due to HDFS-6984 commit. [FileStatus.java#L104-L104|https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/12e44e7bdaf53d3720a89d32f0cc2717241bd6b2/hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/FileStatus.java#L104-L104]. 2. Test failure in [TestGetFileStatus.java#L88-L89|https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/4966a6e26e45d7dc36e0b270066ff7c87bcd00cc/hadoop-tools/hadoop-azure-datalake/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/adl/TestGetFileStatus.java#L88-L89], is also related to 1.

[~vishwajeet.dusane],
